name: Candy Fruits Village
description:
Explore the mysterious world of candy fruits and try to find the perfect match to achieve greater points. Switch and match our happy candy fruits to unlock new levels, destroy obstacles, and achieve great points. There are plenty of challenging tasks to reach that needs quick thinking but also smart moves.
Simply slide the rows or columns to find the best match on the board.
Tasty fruits, color bombs and various other powerful boosters to help you blast various barriers encountered.
